apps.name: uYouPlus (No App Extensions)
apps.versionDescription:
## ⚠️ WARNING ⚠️:
- Google **_once again_** added new implementation that prevents users from signing in to modified YouTube apps (#683). 
- This only affect new user (first time sign-in). If you have been logged in already on the old version, DO NOT uninstall the app. Otherwise, you'll have trouble logging back in.
- A workaround for this issue can be found here: https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/discussions/447#discussion-4380947

## Changelog:
- YouTube v17.49.6.
- iSponsorBlock: Fixed iSponsorBlock's buttons missing in the video control overlay (#771).
- YouPiP v1.7.16: Fixed crashing when activating PiP with "Legacy PiP" enabled (#788).
- Return YouTube Dislike v1.10.0: Dislike number is now displayed in the correct location.
- uYouPlus:
 - Fixed the welcome screen of uYou doesn't disappear after installation (#664).
 - Reorganize the setting page.
 - New options: Disable snap to chapter, disable pinch to zoom, hide channel watermark, red progress bar, hide button(s) in Shorts. Check the setting for new features. 

## Note:
- If you like the app, considering [support the developers!](https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus#support-the-developers) 
- YTUHD is not stable atm. You might encounter stuttering, heat, battery drain..., especially when playing at 2160p (4K) quality. However, this should not happen if you use TrollStore.
- Unless you're using TrollStore, deep-link (aka Open in the YouTube App) simply will not work. Fortunately, there are several workarounds [here](https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/wiki/FAQ#q-deep-link-aka-open-in-the-youtube-app-doesnt-work).

## Support the developers:
- [**MiRO92**](https://twitter.com/miro92): https://github.com/MiRO92/uYou-for-YouTube#support
- [**PoomSmart**](https://twitter.com/poomsmart): https://poomsmart.github.io
- [**level3tjg**](https://twitter.com/level3tjg): https://ko-fi.com/level3tjg
- [**BandarHL**](https://twitter.com/bandarhl): https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/BandarHL
- [**julioverne**](https://twitter.com/ijulioverne): https://www.patreon.com/julioverne
- [**Galactic-dev**](https://twitter.com/dev_galactic): 
 - Paypal: https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/DBrett684 
 - Venmo: https://venmo.com/u/DavidBrett

apps.localizedDescription:
uYouPlus is a modified version of YouTube with many extra features.

Tweaks:
- uYou: Many features, including remove ads, background playback and download videos
- iSponsorBlock: Skip sponsors in videos, based on the SponsorBlock API (https://sponsor.ajay.app/)
- YouPiP: Enable picture-in-picture for videos
- YTUHD: Enable the ability to watch videos in 2K and 4K
- YTAutoFullScreen: Automatically switch to full screen when starting a video
- YTClassicVideoQuality: Revert to old video quality selector
These are not all the tweaks, a full list is in https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus

This is a modified version of uYouPlus without app extensions, which means that there is no Open in YouTube Safari or share sheet extension.
